file_content.text: You've taken everything but our lives, please leave us that!
Ahh! Oh, no no no!
Please don't kill us! We aren't armed!
This doesn't have to get ugly.
Better make yourself useful.
I'm looking for someone you may have taken captive. A Mandalorian named Torian.
Where do you keep prisoners?
I--I don't--anyone know what she's talking about?
I--I don't--anyone know what he's talking about?
They don't have what you want... they've been hiding in here since the Imperial transports hit the ground.
Let them go and I'll tell you what you want to know.
Let's hear what you have to say, first. You don't want to lie.
I can't trust you.
They can go, start talking.
You're way too trusting.
Bye, bye!
You're gonna tell me anyway. If I don't like what I hear, they all die.
Spill it, or I blast everyone.
You really don't want to hold out on my friend here.
Please don't give us any trouble.
Don't try anything desperate; we can probably work this out. All right?
We haven't made contact with any Mandalorian troops, but we have been dealing with sniper attacks the last few weeks.
I'm certain the sniper's been taking shelter at an old excavation site nearby, but everyone I've sent to investigate has turned up dead.
That's all I know... hope it was worth all the lives you stole today. Now let me die in peace.
There. You know everything I do, let the civilians go.
They can do what they like; I'm done here.
Deal's a deal.
You just bought their lives.
Smart move.
Eh, probably chump change anyway, right?
Thanks... Captain.
Good....
Captain Riss! Captain! Please, hang on! Captain...!
Helpful, but not enough to overlook what the Empire's paying.
I'd rather collect on them.
Oh! Scary, scary! Blizz not watch!
No!
All in a day's work.
I'm gonna be sick.
I surrender! Please don't kill me!
They can go, start talking.
